original_title: 超英雄祭 KAMEN RIDER × SUPER SENTAI LIVE & SHOW 2019
overview: Kamen Rider Zi-O & Kaitou Sentai Lupinranger VS Police Sentai Patranger! A special event consisting of talks by show casts and luxurious music live by artists who energize the Kamen Rider & Super Sentai series. At Music Live, a special live performance by amazing guest artists has been arranged! We will deliver a luxurious collaboration live only for Super Hero Festival!
title: Super Hero Festival: Kamen Rider x Super Sentai Live & Show 2019
